summary: Creative, detailed, passionate and technical results-driven Senior Color Analyst with experience in fast-paced fashion manufacturing and retail. Creates color strategies for product development, drives revenue growth, and collaborates across design, merchandising, sourcing and manufacturing to deliver fashion-forward, wearable apparel.

experience.title: Colour Analyst
experience.description: Chose seasonal color palettes (Pantone PMS) for design and graphics; visually evaluated seasonal color lab dips/bulk submissions; communicated evaluation results with offshore and domestic vendors; managed color processes and requirements; developed new labels, crests and hangtags for the design team.

experience.title: Womens Apparel Color Analyst
experience.description: Evaluated seasonal colours for Sears brands (Nevada, Jessica, Jessica Sport, Tradition, Together, Attitude, La Redoute and Somewhere) using instrumental color measurement and visual evaluation. Created Labels/Hangtags & Logos documents for internal distribution. Communicated with colour standard suppliers-Archroma (Div. of Clariant) and Pantone. Data entry used for Quarterly Metrics.

experience.title: Sr. Color Analyst
experience.description: Evaluation of seasonal colors for Old Navy, Gap, Gap Outlet, Banana Republic and Banana Republic Factory Store using instrumental color measurement and visual evaluation. Provided basic color training to onboarding vendors/mills and color vision testing to production employees at GIS Americas. Delivered Global Color & Sr. Product Integrity quarterly global color metric reports. Assisted GAP & Banana Republic Denim production teams in shade band approvals and cross-matched Pantone colors for screen prints. Distributed color standards to vendors/mills and maintained color equipment and color standard inventory.

experience.title: Senior Color Analyst
experience.description: Provided sole responsibility for all color issues, evaluations and color recommendations for fabrics; created seasonal color palettes across divisions, categories, prints and fabrics. Evaluated seasonal color submissions using instrumental color measurement and visual evaluation. Provided basic color training to onboarding vendors/mills and color vision testing to production employees. Managed color training, support and leadership for direct reports. Advised on fabric dye stuff limitations and color matching with Production and Merchandising teams. Assisted in seasonal trend research and shade band approvals; collaborated with global color teams and color service providers to develop custom color standards and ensure dye and shade accuracy. Maintained color equipment and color standard inventory; updated Gap Inc. Color Standard Operating Manual.

education.school: Richard Robinson Academy of Fashion Design

certifications: Project Management Courses - ECornell (affiliated with Cornell University)
Time Management Course - ECornell (affiliated with Cornell University)
